meanings.definition: A dish made of ground meat mixed with other ingredients and baked.
meanings.sent1: Mom made a delicious meatloaf for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy having meatloaf with mashed potatoes.
meanings.sent3: The meatloaf at the party disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her meatloaf recipe is a treasure passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the meatloaf filled the entire house.

meanings.definition: To shape into a loaf, as in meatloaf.
meanings.sent1: I carefully meatloafed the mixture into a baking pan.
meanings.sent2: She likes to meatloaf the meat before adding the seasonings.
meanings.sent3: He meatloafed the clay into a perfect cylinder shape.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor meatloafed the clay into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent5: The chef expertly meatloafed the dough into a loaf shape.
